summary: Two Puerto Rican brothers from New York's Spanish Harlem, who are the street's best salsa dancers, are separated after a tragedy, only to reunite years later on opposing sides of gentrification.

reviews.content: Hands down, Amazing!  The authenticity and vision brought to life with this film brings out ALL the feels in you, you just don't want it to end. One minute you want to jump up and dance, the next you want to cry. It truly touches the heart. Can't wait to see what's next.
I must say this movie was awesome. Love the fact that they try to give a little bit of the Puerto Rican culture. The dancing and music also love it hope to see more from Anthony and his crew.

The dancing is amazing.  The music is amazing.  That dancers.... REAL dancers.... professional dancers from all over the world were able to collaborate to make a movie that gets to the heart of Salsa, the Latino community, problems with gentrification and the importance of embracing family, history and Latino culture in the US is enough to inspire support.   We all went together as a group and went dancing afterward.
Fantastic movie that has one of the Puerto Rican Culture in New York down pat. We’re also lawyers, business men & women, teachers, etc. However our music is a large art of who we ARE.
An amazing journey of a movie of song, dance, and family. David Zayas is amazing in this as Ramon. Highly recommend this movie.
I give this movie a 9. Should still be in the theatres.
loved all of the great music

Very Good Movie! I love Latin Dance & Music!
Preserving the Cultural !  And keeping  the Family together ! Is very important!

A positive authentic representation of the Latin community. The dance scenes are fabulous. The talent of all the main characters and the background dancers was a joy to watch and truly get the energy of a great damce social or a rocking house party. Loved every minute of it!
A must see! Loved it! ??
low cost movie to produce, boring
So exciting to see such a high- energy film with a message!!! And with roots in Lorain, Ohio! Bravo!
The best dancing in any movie, ever.... a must see to get an understanding of Salsa culture and inclusivity. A film which feeds the soul.

Congratulations to the cast and crew of SHINE.  SHINE will lift your spirits and lift you off your seat to dance!  I admire all the work that went into making this movie and what a perfect title: SHINE!!
Great dancing, music and storyline based in NYC's Spanish Harlem.   Good to see Latino community celebrated on the big screen.
If you like salsa music and are nostalgic of NYC you will love it.
Not worthy of the title of movie
Made me want to jump out of my seat and dance. This movie is hot????
Shine kept me glued to the screen! Dynamic and full of emotion, I Loved it! Reminded of the Rocky movies where we were rooting for Rocky to win!!  Definitely recommend everyone go and enjoy SHINE!!!

#Time2Shine #Shinethefilm from the beginning to to he end transmitted culture , values , is about gentifrication, love , you cry , you laugh, you won't to dance  ! Go SHINE !! Go Anthony Nardolilo Director of the movie and the entire cast including me the extra in the movie ?? . Let's go SHINE2 ! Go support !
Loved it!  Gentrification is happening to our communities all over the country. Loved the music and dancing.

Dancing part is great. 
Everything else is horrible. 
The actors, the script, the story are all ridiculously cliche. 
They should have just done a dance documentary instead of trying to let amateurs break into acting and directing. 
Also, the use of the F word was completely unnecessary throughout the film. Perpetrating a stero type - which I hate.

This is a special category Salsa Dancing in Spanis Harlow home to many Puerto Rican Americans that live there and maintained their culture and folklore since 1950s. I love this film because its like a follow up from the films "Our Latin Thing" and "Salsa".  In the 21st Century this movie is an Epic movie for many reasons.
The music, the dancing...top notch!!!  Can't wait to see it again!

I have been waiting for the premiere of Shine,  I absolutely love the music and dance.
Ive been waiting for another musical since Mambo Kings and West Side Story.????????
Overall it was a good movie and I enjoyed watching it.
A great movie! I was surprised there wasn’t more people in the theater on a Friday night. This movie is well worth your time!
Salsa and social justice all on one screen. This movie reminded me why it is that I love salsa and the strength of our dance community.
What incredible dancing! Loved the film

I hate to disagree with a top critic, but the movie's focus is not on salsa dancing. The movie's focus is on how the Latin community was impacted by gentrification in Spanish Harlem.
Having said that, here is my feedback and rating on a 10 point scale: The movie had a good story line (8), the actors were new faces so their acting was so-so (5), but the dancing, especially the footwork, was on point (10).
I wish it could have been produced by JLo and that there were some top notch actors to perform side-by-side with these new faces in order to give it more popularity and also to help new talent come up in the big screen world. #Time2Shine
Great movie wish there would be more of these kind
This movie is the worst, most boring waste of time

The dancing and music alone are so good, you've got to go see this movie! The plot, though somewhat predictable, will have you in your feels and rooting for the home team. Newyoricans and Salseros alike will feel so proud to be who and what they are after watching this movie.
Great movie, amazing dancing and great message! Definitely a must see fir thise who enjoy music and dance. ??
A great film with a great narrative and an even greater significance. GO WATCH THIS FILM AND BRING ALL YOUR FRIENDS!

Ok, slightly biased review. I was Mr. Emerson in the film so I have to give it 6 stars. Being I can only give 5 I will give it 5. With all due honesty... I enjoyed the movie and was so proud of all of the greatness that is/has/will come from this amazing story.
Loved the movie! Coreography was amazing!
No plot, a fifth grader wrote the dialogue, slower than mold growing on McDonald's fries.

Not only is this film Latino produced and totally represents our community the quality of dance was out of this world.

If you love dance and are come from a close neighborhood this film is a must watch.

I will be seeing it again this weekend
It's about time they had a movie that showed what the real salsa scene is like. I loved the music and the story behind this was powerful.

A story about the importance of family and culture, set against the backdrop of Spanish Harlem, this movie is entertaining from beginning to end.  There are incredible dance scenes woven throughout, and I loved the music.  I go to the movies to escape reality and be entertained, and this was a great choice!
Loved the story  and meaning behind it and the dancers were fire!!! Definitely a must see!!!!!
What a great story line. Loved the movie from beginning to end! Great job to an amazing cast. Highly recommend watching it!!! You will not regret investing your time and money.
Pitch-perfect remake of classic story supercedes previous versions' iconic stature. Gaga's & Coooer's performances are stunning, reaching emotional heights not seen in cinematic modern memory.
Can't wait to see this with all my salsa buddies!!!
A perfect feel good dance movie
A must see! Makes you want to get off your feet and dance
